about_the_game:
Truck tuning is something that is close to the heart of all truckers. If you have ever been to a truck show, you would see that the amount of love and effort that some drivers are willing to devote to their vehicles is unbelievable. Tons of chrome, expensive hand-made parts, lights, and paints - they can turn a regular truck into a work of art!

Explore this phenomenon yourself, and trick up your Renault Trucks T in Euro Truck Simulator 2 with countless possible combinations of aftermarket parts including:

New Paint Jobs

Air Tanks
Beacon
Lower Grille Guard
Corner Deflectors
Door Handles
Door Steps
Door Trim
Rear Exhaust
Front Bumper
Front Cabin Trim
Front Fender
Front Fender Bottom
Headlight Guard

Filter

Sideskirt Bars
Rims

Truck tuning is something that is close to the heart of all truckers. If you have ever been to a truck show, you would see that the amount of love and effort that some drivers are willing to devote to their vehicles is unbelievable. linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Hard Drive: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (2 GB)
  • Hard Drive: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Hard Drive: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 (Yosemite)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (Intel HD 5300)
  • Hard Drive: 3 GB available space

  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (2 GB)
  • Hard Drive: 12 GB available space

short_description: The amount of love and effort that some drivers are willing to devote to their vehicles is unbelievable. Tons of chrome, expensive hand-made parts, lights, and paints - they turn a regular truck into a work of art! Get this DLC yourself, and trick up your Renault Trucks T in Euro Truck Simulator 2!
supported_languages: English, German, French, Italian, Korean, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Norwegian, Swedish, Hungarian, Czech, Romanian, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil, Bulgarian, Greek, Ukrainian
